# JUSU Course — Build Web Pages with Python

Author: Francis Jusu

Welcome to the JUSU beginner course. This course teaches how to build simple websites and webapps using only Python and the JUSU library (no extra build tools required). Each lesson includes a short readable lesson and an interactive Jupyter notebook with hands-on exercises.

Structure:
- lessons/lesson-01.md — Lesson text
- notebooks/lesson-01.ipynb — Interactive notebook for Lesson 1
- examples/lesson1.py — Example scripts you can run locally

License: MIT
